articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Servicepersons' Art Performance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Servicepersons' Art Performance
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, enjoyed an art performance given by soldiers of companies under KPA Air and Anti-Air Force and KPA units 549, 264, 233 and 630 who proved successful at the 37th Art Festival of KPA Servicepersons.
					 They put on the stage colorful numbers of diverse forms.
					
					 The performance impressively showed the prides that soldiers have taken in the course of turning companies into their dear home pervaded with the revolutionary comradeship and the trait of unity between officers and men true to the intention of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, and their happy military service under his loving care.
					
					 And it well represented the militant stamina of soldiers as stalwart combatants engrossed in military training as well as the looks of soldiers who are performing their duty as sons and daughters of the people.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed great satisfaction over the fact that all company soldiers gave a successful performance clear in political standard and high in ideological value and artistry.
					
					 Saying with high appreciation that the performance fully reflects the idea, line and policy of the WPK and truthfully and vividly shows the life of servicepersons and that it is a militant performance giving off powder smell and a performance of high educational value replete with revolutionary optimism, he gave thanks of the KPA Supreme Commander to the performers and creative officials.
					
					 He expressed belief that those participating in the 37th Art Festival of KPA Servicepersons would work bigger feats in military training and service in the future, too.
					
					 Among the audience were So Hong Chan, Jo Nam Jin, Ryom Chol Song, Han Kwang Sang and service personnel of the KPA.

articles.title: NDC Policy Department Spokesman Hits at S. Korean Authorities' Reckless Provocation
articles.content:
NDC Policy Department Spokesman Hits at S. Korean Authorities' Reckless Provocation
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC) issued the following statement Tuesday over one more anti-DPRK confrontation farce staged in south Korea with the lapse of five years after the Yonphyong Island shelling incident as a momentum:
					 On Nov. 23 the south Korean military authorities staged a reckless artillery firing drill in the hotspot of the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 For fear of the retaliatory spirit and retaliation of our servicepersons in the southwestern sector of the front, they retracted their plan for live shell firing toward waters of the DPRK side but staged a firing drill in the waters around the five islands in the West Sea, the most acute area. This was the most vicious military provocation aimed at confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and a reckless saber-rattling by those who are oblivious of the defeat they suffered five years ago.
					
					 What was more serious is a "memorial service on the fifth anniversary" held in Seoul, another anti-DPRK confrontation farce.
					
					 Attending the service were the authorities including the prime minister and the defence minister and the chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, the chief of staff of the three services and other political and military bellicose elements of south Korea and even the commander of the south Korea-U.S. combined forces.
					
					 At the "service" they didn't utter a word of apology for the fact that they provoked the Yonphyong Island shelling incident, but made absurd remarks aimed to shift the blame for it onto the DPRK.
					
					 What enraged us is that they conducted without hesitation such horrible deeds as tearing the flag of the DPRK and hurting the dignity of its supreme leadership, a sin to be punished by Heaven.
					
					 They even used reptile media to spread sheer lies that their shelling in the incident left ten-odd soldiers of the KPA dead and tens heavily wounded.
					
					 The gravity of the situation lies in that the above-said confrontation farce was staged under the direct wire-pulling of Chongwadae.
					
					 As soon as the chief executive of Chongwadae came back from her foreign trip, she incited the fever of confrontation with the DPRK in her "video message", in which she expressed "condolence" on the dead provokers of the Yonphyong Island shelling incident and called for "rapid counteraction to any provocation by the north" and "perfect military preparedness".
					
					 After all, the south Korean authorities clearly showed again that their hostile and confrontation "policy towards the north" still remains unchanged.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday what results such confrontation racket they staged when various pending issues between the north and the south are put on the agenda, will bring about.
					
					 We will follow the south Korean authorities' attitude.

articles.title: President of Laos Supports Korean People's Just Cause
articles.content:
President of Laos Supports Korean People's Just Cause
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces and head of the DPRK military delegation on an official goodwill visit to the Lao People's Democratic Republic, met and had a talk with Choummaly Saynasone, president of Laos and general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, on Monday.
					 The president recalled that he visited the DPRK in 2011 and met leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 He said that the army and people of the DPRK are achieving signal successes in the national defense, in the struggle to defend socialism and the building of a thriving nation thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Noting that the two countries are supporting each other in the regional and international arenas and closely cooperating in the struggle for defending socialism, he stressed that Laos would support the cause of the Workers' Party of Korea, the government, service personnel and people of the DPRK for achieving the reunification of the country and building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Talks between DPRK Military Delegation and Delegation of Ministry of Defense of Laos Held
articles.content:
Talks between DPRK Military Delegation and Delegation of Ministry of Defense of Laos Held
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- There took place talks between the DPRK military delegation and the delegation of the Ministry of Defense of Laos at the building of the Lao Ministry of Defense on Monday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were members of the military delegation led by Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, the DPRK ambassador to the country and from the Lao side Minister of Defense of Laos Sengnouane Sayalat, vice-director of the General Political Bureau, vice-chief of the General Staff and other high-ranking officers.
					
					 At the talks both sides discussed the issues of boosting cooperation between the armies of the two countries.
					
					 Prior to the talks, a ceremony welcoming the DPRK military delegation was held.
					
					 The DPRK military delegation laid a wreath before the Monument to the Unknown Soldier.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Slams S. Korean Chief Executive's Solicitation of Cooperation in Anti-DPRK Nuclear Racket
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Slams S. Korean Chief Executive's Solicitation of Cooperation in Anti- DPRK's Nuclear Racket
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Tuesday issued information bulletin No. 1102 as regards the south Korean chief executive's disclosure of her inveterate anti-DPRK attitude at international meetings during her foreign tours from Nov. 14 to 23.
					 The information bulletin said:
					
					 The chief executive of south Korea, wherever she went, conducted such disgraceful diplomacy as soliciting cooperation in the anti-DPRK nuclear racket, jabbering that she expected the "north to dismantle its nuclear weapons and opt for opening and cooperation" and "it is necessary to pressurize the north to make a strategic decision of scraping nuclear program and to bring about changes."
					
					 This is, in fact, nothing but foolish acts of the south Korean authorities to cover up the nature of the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula and justify their confrontation policy and the U.S. saber-rattling for a nuclear war against the DPRK. 
					
					 It is publicly recognized that the nuclear issue on the peninsula was spawned due to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK and its moves to stifle it.
					
					 The U.S. is still escalating the tension on the peninsula, threatening the DPRK with nuclear weapons and the south Korean warmongers are openly pursuing a wild ambition for a nuclear war against the DPRK, zealously toeing its line. 
					
					 She insulted the compatriots in the north and solicited cooperation in the nuclear racket against the DPRK, regardless of the nature of international meetings and their participants. This was a vivid manifestation of her inveterate hostility towards the DPRK.
					
					 Peace is preserved on the peninsula despite ever more desperate moves of the U.S. and its allies to stifle the DPRK with nuclear weapons. This is entirely ascribable to the self-defensive nuclear deterrent of the DPRK.
					
					 It is shame on the Korean nation that she pulls up the DPRK over its nuclear weapons protecting peace on the peninsula and security of the nation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should clearly understand that the DPRK will bolster up its self-defensive nuclear deterrent which represents its dignity and pride as long as the U.S. hostile policy and danger of a nuclear war persist and the DPRK's nuclear deterrent can never be a bargaining chip.

articles.title: Japanese Buddhist Delegation Here
articles.content:
Japanese Buddhist Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A Japanese Buddhist delegation led by Ryoko Nishioka, priest of Enman Temple and former executive secretary general of Tendai Religion, and Raitei Arima, director general of Kyoto Buddhist Society of Japan, as its honorary leader arrived here on Tuesday.

articles.title: Thai Businessmen Here
articles.content:
Thai Businessmen Here
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Tit Shan Sandy Cheng,chairman of Thai Loxpac Co. Ltd., and his party arrived here on Tuesday.

articles.title: Syrian Diplomats Visit Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill
articles.content:
Syrian Diplomats Visit Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Tammam Sulaiman, Syrian ambassador to the DPRK, and his staff members visited the DPRK-Syria Friendship Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill on Tuesday on the 45th anniversary of the Corrective Movement in Syria.
					 The guests laid a bouquet before the mosaics depicting images of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Being briefed on the proud path covered by the mill under the warm care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, they went round the room dedicated to the history of the mill, the room for the education in the revolutionary history and various production processes of the mill.
					
					 They enjoyed a performance given by an art circle of the mill.

articles.title: Romanian Diplomats Enjoy Circus Performance
articles.content:
Romanian Diplomats Enjoy Circus Performance
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Gheorghe Cioaca, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Romanian embassy here, and his staff members enjoyed a circus performance at the Pyongyang Circus Theater on Tuesday on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Romania.
					 Pyongyangites watched the performance.
					
					 The acrobatics depicted with peculiar skills and high artistry the revolutionary spirit of the Korean people waging a general offensive to greet the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with unprecedented labor achievements.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the spectators.

articles.title: Mongolian Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Mongolian Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A friendship delegation of Ulan Bator City of Mongolia led by Erdene Bat-Uul, governor and mayor of the city, left here for home Tuesday.

articles.title: Granite Output on Increase
articles.content:
Granite Output on Increase
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Granite output is on the increase in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The Osoksan and Onchon granite mines and the Ryonggang County Building Stone Mine have been taking the lead in boosting the production this year.
					
					 They have produced tens of thousands square meters of processed granites and building stones for the construction or remodeling of edifices, including the Mirae Scientists Street, Sci-Tech Complex, Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace and Central Zoo.
					
					 On the basis of modernization of equipment, they are paying deep attention to raising the cutting rate of granite while introducing new blasting methods in production.
					
					 In particular, the Onchon Granite Mine upgraded processing machines, thus doubling the production than ever before.

articles.title: Unseasonable Weather Observed in November
articles.content:
Unseasonable Weather Observed in November
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- An unseasonable weather lingers on the DPRK in November.
					 Frequent rainfalls have been witnessed throughout the country while temperature remaining higher than the average.
					
					 An official concerned said that the number of rainy days doubled the average (five days) from November 1 to 20 with 66.6mm of rainfall against the average of 27.4mm.
					
					 It rained 77 to 330mm in the east coastal areas of Kangwon and South Hamgyong provinces and northern parts of the west coastal areas and, in particular, 525 mm in Kosong County, Kangwon Province.
					
					 In this period, the average temperature stood at 6.7 degrees centigrade against the average (3.7 degrees centigrade).
					
					 Meteorologists say warm and damp air, affected by subtropical anticyclone over the Pacific caused by El Nino, stays on whole part of Korea, preventing the inflow of cold air from the north.

articles.title: Child Literary Talent
articles.content:
Child Literary Talent
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Children in the DPRK are giving full play to their ability with nothing to envy under the socialist education system.
					 Among them is Kim Jin Ung who is studying at Janggyong Primary School in Sosong District, Pyongyang.
					
					 He is known as a young literary talent for his works of different themes.
					
					 In recent years, he has produced scores of literary works which show the happy life of schoolchildren and beauties of the country.
					
					 Typical of them are childpoem "Qualification", which was awarded "Our Classroom" Literary Prize last year, and fable "Plowing by Squirrel" appreciated at the literature prize contest this year.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. Human Rights Row against DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. Human Rights Row against DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. held an international meeting in south Korea to deal with the so-called "human rights issue" of the DPRK.
					 At the meeting the "special envoy" of the U.S. Department of State cried out for "keeping sustained pressure upon north Korea in the future, too," jabbering that to improve the human rights performance in north Korea is a long-term and hard struggle but the U.S. and its allies should not give it up.
					
					 Other riff-raffs asserted that the DPRK's "human rights issue" should be universally called into question.
					
					 These outbursts are nothing but ridiculous outpourings let loose by those betes noires to bring down the social system of the DPRK out of their outdated inveterate repugnancy and hostility towards it.
					
					 The U.S. "human rights" row is a product of its hostile policy towards the DPRK. It is nothing but a last-ditch effort of a drowning guy catching at a straw as it finds it hard to hurt Pyongyang through a nuclear racket.
					
					 That is proved by the fact that the U.S. tricksters including Obama uttered that the "human rights row" is more effective for bringing down north Korea than a military method, claiming the "settlement of the human rights issue" hinges on the spread of more information.
					
					 Each "human rights" row the U.S. kicks off faces the strong opposition and criticism from the world community as it is an open provocation to the sovereign states courting its displeasure.
					
					 The U.S. is now hit hard from all sides in the international arena due to its domestic and foreign policies against human rights.
					
					 The DPRK remains unperturbed no matter when and where the U.S. and its allies stage a "human rights" farce against the former.
					
					 It has the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses and the Korean-style human rights standard of prioritizing the wishes and interests of the working people that the U.S. and other capitalist countries can neither have nor imitate.
					
					 The U.S. is at a loss what to do with tens of millions of poor people and more than hundreds of thousands of homeless people and over a hundred thousand victims of shooting sprees a year. For Washington to find fault with someone's "human rights" performance is like flies over a dumping ground scoffing at bees and butterflies of a garden.
					
					 The DPRK will resolutely counter any U.S. move to bring down it and further consolidate its socialist system centered on the popular masses.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Persisting in Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Persisting in Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article assails the U.S. for persisting in its bankrupt and tattered hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 This finds a vivid expression in the facts that the U.S. refuses to disband the "UN Command", keeps its troops in south Korea and does not respond to the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty with it.
					
					 The article cites facts to prove that the "UN Command" is a sheer fabrication as the U.S. illegally cooked up it through high-handed and arbitrary practices from A to Z.
					
					 The U.S. ruling quarters have often advertised that they have no hostile policy towards the DPRK. If what it claims is true, it should dissolve the "UN Command", withdraw its troops from south Korea and opt for the conclusion of the peace treaty with the DPRK.
					
					 It is unreasonable for the U.S. to cite "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK had been a non-nuclear state for decades. Even after emerging a nuclear weapons state, it has no idea of deploying nuclear weapons overseas quite contrary to what the U.S. does.
					
					 The U.S. persistently blames the DPRK for its "threat" in a bid to justify and legalize its arms build-up in the Asia-Pacific region and thus hasten the siege to the big powers in the region.
					
					 The U.S. ruling forces' acts of staging ceaseless saber rattling to ignite a new war, while keeping the "UN Command" and their forces in south Korea and escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula, would entail unimaginably disastrous consequences.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams U.S. Development of Nuclear Weapons
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams U.S. Development of Nuclear Weapons
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. air force is pushing forward the development of an undetectable mobile launcher or new ground-launched strategic nuclear missile program capable of being deployed in a tunnel, and this has reached the final phase, according to the Washington Times shortly ago.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a commentary: This indicates the U.S. desperate efforts to retain the position of the "world's only superpower" by overriding Russia and China in the field of strategic nuclear force. 
					
					 It is the U.S. strategic calculation to have an unchallenged strategic armed force more sophisticated and powerful in striking capability than any other powers and thus overpower and contain its rivals and put the world under its control in the end, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The situation goes to prove that the U.S. is the arch criminal sparking off arms race and posing the danger of nuclear proliferation and nuclear blackmail to the world.
					
					 What enrages the international community, in particular, is that the U.S. is mocking at humankind while crying out for building a "world without nuclear weapons" despite its desperate maneuver to hold an unchallenged nuclear edge.
					
					 The U.S. calculates that it can maintain its position as the "world's only superpower" if it keeps stockpiling nuclear weapons. But it is nothing but a foolish ambition of a nuclear maniac.
					
					 Nuclear arms race is like pouring water into a bottomless jar, an act little short of pushing the U.S. into ruin.
					
					 The U.S. has to bear in mind that its policy of military stand-off will never work, and drop its ambition for world domination.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Cruel Suppression of People Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Cruel Suppression of People Censured
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The south side headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification issued a statement denouncing the south Korean authorities for cruelly suppressing the people demanding their right to existence on Nov. 20. 
					 More than 100 000 people gathered in the streets of Seoul and staged action on Nov. 14 demanding a life as human beings as their human rights including the right to existence are abused by the "government," the statement noted, adding:
					
					 However, the regime hurled riot police into brutally suppressing protesters with water cannon. 
					
					 Not content with this, the authorities are going to punish participants in the action as "illegal violent demonstrators".
					
					 The statement demanded the chief executive make an apology and dismiss the chief of the Police Agency who ordered the murderous repressive operation.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Misleading Public Opinion
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Misleading Public Opinion
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea in an editorial on Nov. 19 laid bare the authorities' despicable attempt to mislead public opinion to push forward the introduction of "state-compiled" history textbook. 
					 The editorial said:
					
					 It was disclosed that the authorities misled the public opinion under the pretext of accepting the people's opinion concerning the introduction of "state-compiled" history textbook.
					
					 A typical example of this was the fact that truck loads of "signature papers supporting the introduction of the above-said textbook" were accepted just an hour before the deadline for the accepting the opinions.
					
					 It was also revealed that an organization printed 40,000 signature papers in support of the introduction.
					
					 It was confirmed that the Ministry of Education instructed its employees to classify 200,000 signature papers, even working all night,
					
					 The statement demanded the "government" should immediately retract the above-said introduction.

articles.title: Special Edition of Thongil Issued
articles.content:
Special Edition of Thongil Issued
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A special edition of Thongil, newspaper of the International United Confederation of Koreans, was issued on Nov. 12.
					 The paper carried the contents of the decision of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on convening the 7th Congress of the WPK.
					
					 The paper also carried an article titled "Running counter to the public sentiment leads to self-destruction" assailing the south Korean authorities' unpopular rule.
					
					 The article said fierce actions against the introduction of the "state-compiled" history textbook are under way across south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean public is demanding the retraction of the above-said introduction, accusing the authorities of seeking to revive "yusin" dictatorship through the above-said introduction, the article noted, and went on:
					
					 Those running counter to the public sentiment deserve punishment. The south Korean authorities will inevitably go bankrupt if they persist in the brutal crackdown upon the righteous struggle of the people. 
					
					 The paper conveyed news from the homeland under the caption "By enlisting the foundation and potential of self-supporting national economy."

articles.title: Russian Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Formed
articles.content:
Russian Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Formed
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The Russian committee for remembering Comrade Kim Jong Il was formed in Moscow on Nov. 16 under the sponsorship of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK.
					 V. A. Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly organize political and cultural events including remembrance meeting, photo and book exhibition on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Italian Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Formed
articles.content:
Italian Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Formed
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The Italian committee for remembering Comrade Kim Jong Il was formed in Rome on Nov. 19.
					 Miriam Pellegrini Ferri, president of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy and chairman of the Italian Committee for the Study of Songun Idea for Independence and Sovereignty, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to conduct political and cultural activities praising the immortal revolutionary exploits of leader Kim Jong Il during the remembrance period from November 20 and December 17.

articles.title: Regional Body Urges Obama to Conclude Peace Treaty with DPRK
articles.content:
Regional Body Urges Obama to Conclude Peace Treaty with DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The Latin American and Caribbean Regional Committee to Support the Reunification of Korea sent a letter to the U.S. president on Nov. 14 urging the U.S. to respond to the DPRK's fair and reasonable proposal for concluding a peace treaty.
					 The letter said that the committee sent a letter for the purpose of putting an end to the Korean war ignited by the U.S. against the DPRK in 1950.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 More than 60 years have passed since the Korean Armistice Agreement was concluded.
					
					 The truce was effected on the Korean Peninsula but many countries of Asia and the world are torn with disputes in which modern weapons of mass destruction are indiscriminately used and stand on the brink of a very dangerous new war.
					
					 Not only the Korean people but also the people of the U.S. want peace.
					
					 Peace is very dear and the greatest desire of the world people.
					
					 Hence, we recommend the U.S. president to take a necessary measure for replacing the AA with a peace treaty.
					
					 The DPRK government made a series of proposals for replacing the AA with the peace treaty to the U.S. government but the former regretfully failed to receive any positive answer from the latter and the danger of a nuclear war is increasing on the Korean Peninsula quite contrary to the expectation of the former.
					
					 The U.S. president should behave himself so that humankind may be free from the danger of a nuclear war.

articles.title: Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Inaugurated in Russia
articles.content:
Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Inaugurated in Russia 
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The Party for Peace and Unity of Russia formed the committee for remembering great General Kim Jong Il on Nov. 18.
					 Sazhi Umalatova, chairwoman of the party, was elected chairwoman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly organize political and cultural events praising the noble revolutionary career and undying exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de militares de companias de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de militares de companias de EPC
Pyongyang, 24 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion de los militares de las companias adscritas a las unidades 549, 264, 233 y 630, de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC y de otras del EPC que fueron seleccionadas en el 37o Festival Artistico de Militares del este.
					Los ejecutantes militares pusieron en la escena varias piezas de distintos tipos.
					
					A traves de la funcion, ellos mostraron con emocion sus orgullos sentidos en el proceso de hacer de las companias la casa natal de los soldados, donde reinan la camaraderia revolucionaria y el estilo de la unidad entre los oficiales y soldados en pleno acato al proposito del Comandante Supremo, y mostraron su digna vida militar en el regazo del Mariscal.
					
					Ademas, demostraron bien el aspecto combativo y animado de los combatientes que se dedican al entrenamiento derramando el sudor y el otro de los hijos fieles al pueblo.
					
					La funcion disfruto de grandes aplausos de los espectadores.
					
					El Mariscal mostro gran satisfaccion de que todos los militares de las companias hayan ofrecido una funcion excelente tanto en lo politico como en lo ideo-artistico.
					
					El Mariscal evaluo reiteradamente que la funcion tiene gran significacion educativa en que palpitan la ideologia, la orientacion y la politica del Partido, muestra vividamente la vida de los militares y reina el ambiente combativo y el optimismo revolucionario.
					
					Dio agradecimiento del Comandante Supremo del EPC a los ejecutantes, creadores y funcionarios directivos de la funcion.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los militares participantes en el festival realizaran tambien en el futuro los mayores meritos militares en los ejercicios y la vida militar.
					
					La vieron So Hong Chan, Jo Nam Jin, Ryom Chol Song, Han Kwang Sang, oficiales y soldados del EPC.

articles.title: BP de CDN de RPDC denuncia imprudente alboroto de enfrentamiento de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
BP de CDN de RPDC denuncia imprudente alboroto de enfrentamiento de Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 24 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que el Sur de Corea desarrollo otra farsa de enfrentamiento con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en ocasion del V aniversario del canonazo en la isla Yonphyong el portavoz del Buro Politico del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC hizo publica el dia 24 una declaracion que senala:
					   El 23 del mes en curso las autoridades militares del Sur de Corea realizaron un imprudente ejercicio de fuego artillero en las aguas candentes del Mar Oeste de Corea movilizando los belicistas de la capa miliar.
					
					   Ellas renunciaron el fuego artillero contra el agua jurisdiccional de la RPDC temiendo al impetu aniquilador a los enemigos y la reaccion de venganza de los oficiales y soldados del Frente Sudoeste del Ejercito Popular de Corea. Pero, el mismo hecho de que ellas lo realizaron en el agua alrededor de las cinco islas del Mar Oeste de Corea deviene la mas perversa provocacion militar para la confrontacion fratricida y el imprudente juego perpetrado olvidando de la derrota de hace ahora 5 anos.
					
					   Para colmo, la "ceremonia en memoria de V aniversario" efectuada frente al "Museo de guerra de Ryongsan" situado en Seul fue otra campana de enfrentamiento anti-RPDC.
					
					   Alli tomaron parte los belicistas del circulo politico y militar del Sur de Corea entre otros el premier, el ministro de Defensa Nacional, el presidente de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor, el jefe del Estado Mayor de las fuerzas terrestres, maritimas y aereas, y el comandante de las fuerzas combinadas Sur de Corea-Estados Unidos.
					
					   No fue otro sino el sitio de enfrentamiento fratricida este "acto" en que no refirieron ni una palabra de disculpa por sus actos provocativos del canonazo en la isla Yonphyong, sino lanzaron los absurdos disparates para imputar la responsabilidad a la RPDC.
					
					   Lo que nos causa gran indignacion es que perpetraron los actos gansteriles imperdonables para insultar la maxima dignidad de la RPDC al cabo de desgarrar la sagrada Bandera Nacional de la RPDC en medio de la ciudad de Seul.
					
					   Ademas, movilizaron a los medios de prensa venales a divulgar la mentira absurda de que en el incidente de la isla Yonphyong quedaron muertos mas de 10 militares y heridos decenas de soldados del EPC por el canoneo del ejercito titere surcoreano.
					
					   La gravedad del hecho esta en que tal farsa anti-RPDC se realizo bajo el control directo de Chongwadae.
					
					   Tan pronto como regreso de su gira por el extranjero, la duena de Chongwadae remitio personalmente un "mensaje de imagen" escrito por si misma expresando una supuesta "condolencia" a los provocadores surcoreanos muertos en el canonazo e inculco la furia de enfrentamiento de los belicistas habando de la "reaccion rapida a la provocacion del Norte (de Corea)" y el "establecimiento de la perfecta disposicion militar".
					
					   Asi, las autoridades surcoreanas volvieron a mostrar claramente que el mantenimiento de la "politica hacia el Norte", caracterizado por la hostilidad y confrontacion anti-RPDC, deviene su "principio" invariable.
					
					   Estan muy claras las consecuencias que se emanen  de  tales acciones de confrontacion de las autoridades surcoreanas efectuadas en la situacion actual en que estan en marcha varios programas entre el Norte y el Sur.
					
					   La RPDC observara la actitud de las autoridades surcoreanas.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia viaje de mendicacion de mandataria surcoreana
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia viaje de mendicacion de mandataria surcoreana
Pyongyang, 24 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que durante su gira al ultramar efectuada desde el pasado dia 14 hasta el 23, la mandataria del Sur de Corea expuso en las reuniones internacionales su arraigada naturaleza conflictiva contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 24 una informacion no.1102 como sigue:
					En los lugares a donde llegaba, la mandataria del Sur de Corea mendigo la colaboracion nuclear anti-RPDC diciendo que "deseo que el Norte (de Corea) tome el camino de apertura y cooperacion tras renunciar las armas nucleares" y que "se debe aconsejar al Norte para que este tome una decision estrategica, es decir, renuncie las armas nucleares y opte el camino de cambio".
					
					Esto no pasa de ser un acto absurdo para encubrir la esencia del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y justificar su politica conflictiva y las maniobras de EE.UU. de estallar la guerra nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					Es un hecho reconocido por todos lo que el problema nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana surgio debido a la politica hostil de EE.UU. y las maniobras de aplastamiento anti-RPDC.
					
					Hoy dia tambien, EE.UU. agudiza la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana amenazando con las armas nucleares la RPDC y los belicistas surcoreanos, sumandose activamente alli,  persiguen abiertamente la ambicion de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					La mandataria surcoreana mendigo la colaboracion nuclear anti-RPDC denigrando a los connacionales sin hacer caso de las caracteristicas de la reunion internacional ni su contraparte, lo que es una expresion de arraigada enemistad contra la RPDC.
					
					Aun en medio de las maniobras anti-RPDC cada dia mas recrudescentes de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites, se mantiene la paz en la Peninsula Coreana gracias al disuasivo autodefensivo de la RPDC.
					
					Es una ignominia y verguenza de la nacion cuestionar las armas nucleares de la RPDC que defienden la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la seguridad de la nacion.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben saber claramente que el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo de la RPDC, dignidad y orgullo de la nacion, se fortalecera mas mientras existan la politica hostil de EE.UU. y el peligro de la guerra nuclear.

articles.title: Pak Yong Sik se reune con presidente laosiano
articles.content:
Pak Yong Sik se reune con presidente laosiano
Pyongyang, 24 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares quien realiza una visita oficial y de amistad a la Republica Democratica Popular Lao en calidad del jefe de la delegacion militar de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se reunio el dia 23 en la presidencia con Choummaly Sayasone, secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao.
					  En la ocasion Choummaly Sayasone recordo que cuando visitaba la RPDC en 2011, se encontro con el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					  Subrayo que gracias a la sabia direccion del Mariscal, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea logran exitos asombrosos en la defensa de la patria, la lucha por la defensa del socialismo y en la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					  Dijo que los dos paises se solidarizan entre si en las escenas regionales e internacionales y se cooperan estrechamente en la lucha por defender el socialismo.
					
					  Prosiguio que Laos apoyara la causa del Partido, el gobierno, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea por la reunificacion del pais y la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre delegacion militar de RPDC y Laos
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre delegacion militar de RPDC y Laos 
Pyongyang, 24 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 23 en la sede del Ministerio de Defensa de Laos las conversaciones entre la delegacion militar de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la delegacion del Ministerio de Defensa de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao. 
					Participaron, por la parte coreana, los miembros de la delegacion militar encabezada por el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres, Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares y el embajador en Laos, y por la laosiana, el ministro de Defensa Sengnouane Sayalat, el subjefe de la Direccion Politica General, el subjefe del Estado Mayor General y otros funcionarios del circulo militar. 
					
					En la ocasion ambas partes discutieron los temas para fortalecer mas la cooperacion entre los ejercitos de los dos  paises. 
					
					Antes del inicio de las conversaciones, tuvo lugar una ceremonia de bienvenida a la delegacion militar coreana. 
					
					Pak Yong Sik paso revista junto con Sengnouane Sayalat a la guardia de honor del Ejercito Popular de Laos. 
					
					Por otra parte, la delegacion coreana deposito una ofrenda floral ante el Monumento a soldados anonimos.
